name: Forest Explore - Daniel Håkansson - Milstolpe 3
description:
The background used is free for commercial and personal use if you provide a link to the creator - which is fair, so here is the link https://pngtree.com/freebackground/fantasy-fairy-forest-background-material_9927...

The mechanics are with the platform and the focus lies in jumping around, but there is no death or box that stops you from going outside the area, so if that happens you need to restart
